title: New client is a p.o.s.
body:
40 minutes of trying to start up a game.

Every time the client goes from waiting time to champ select, black screen.

Lost LP.

30 min leaver wait timer.

What a piece of shit.

Fix it plz. kthxbye

replies.body: Funny how riot thinks it's a computer or network issue when clearly the majority of the community is having the the same exact issue after the client updated.

Same issue. Not connection issue. It's only happening since the patch that we just got (7.4)

Been using the new client all this time and problems only started happening after the new patch.

I don't have the start up issue but the black screen once you get into champ select left me at low priority que as well.

Please look into the issue.

can you please do something about this shit client riot, we dont want dodges and -LP in over half our games. quit changing things that work great. Also, who wants to be forced to see social screen. we play games on computers not to be social!

To update, we've seen a few reports on this and would like to investigate further.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs, and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can investigate further.  During the meantime, a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) can help fix this up.  Thanks all for the reports and help!

This seems like a network problem failing to stay connected to champion select or render assets.  It sucks that you got a lower priority queue, and I suggest taking that time to go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  The steps there should fix this up.
